CustomField.defaultValue: "-How long have you been in the business?"+SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")+ "-How did you get into the business?" +SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")+ "-What keeps you busy outside of work (Hobbies, family, etc)?" +SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")+ "-Have you ever cold called before? (Just ask between rapport and PAS)"+SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")+ "-Have you ever paid for it prior to this?"+SUBSTITUTE($Label.NewLine, "-", "")+ "-What other forms of marketing are you currently using?"
CustomField.label: Get to know each other
